pullrequest.title: add support for keyboard teleop the hands

content.raw: I'm only seeing 4 hand joints instead of 5 in the modified file.  Looks like thumb roll was left out.  There may be no need for thumb roll, but it makes the joint ordering off by 1.  For example, you have the right joint index 0 maximum value set to 0.55, but shouldn't it be 1.4, as joint 0 corresponds to thumb roll?  Joint index 1 (thumb pitch) max is 0.55, etc.
content.html: I'm only seeing 4 hand joints instead of 5 in the modified file. Looks like thumb roll was left out. There may be no need for thumb roll, but it makes the joint ordering off by 1. For example, you have the right joint index 0 maximum value set to 0.55, but shouldn't it be 1.4, as joint 0 corresponds to thumb roll? Joint index 1 (thumb pitch) max is 0.55, etc.
